title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 980.1 - Authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 980.1 - Authority

State Regulations

Article 2-F of the Transportation Law established the Rural

Public Transportation Coordination Assistance Program and requires that the

Commissioner promulgate rules and regulations in order to implement the
provisions of that article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
980.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
